name: Djinn [3]
description: An axe imbued with the power of an earth dragon. Causes the earth itself to shake with each swing.
bonuses: 5% Chance to reflect 40% of damage for 8 seconds when attacked.
5% chance to auto cast Stone Curse status when attacked.
MATK + 20%. Enables use of Level 6 [Fire Bolt] and 10% chance to auto cast Level 6 [Fire Bolt] when attacking normally.
50% more damage and 75% reduced zeny cost with [Mammonite].
[Demonstration] damage interval reduced by 75% (every 0.25 secs instead of 1 sec). Remove [Demonstration] on unequip.
20% chance to ignore potion cost with [Potion Pitcher] and [Slim Potion Pitcher].
PvM: Ignore [Acid Terror] Acid Bottle cost and [Demonstration] Fire Bottle cost.
PvM: [Acid Terror] takes on the element of the user's weapon.
Chemical Protection Skills (except FCP) have double duration and a 25% chance to ignore Glistening Coat cost.
[Bio Cannibalize] plants receive 40% less damage, ASPD/ATK x2, and HIT/HP x3; destroy bio plants on equip/unequip.
PvM: [Demonstration] takes on the element of the user's weapon.
